channel.title: Slides on English Version
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on English Version

item.title: Two examples of iteration with purrr - Class for the R-Studio certification
item.description: Certification I recently became certified as a R-Studio Tidyverse instructor. To pass the certification there are two exams, one of Tidyverse or Shiny and other of teaching. In this blog I am going to share a 15 minute class that I prepared to as parto of the teaching exam. What to teach about? I use loops frecquently in for my work. I decided to look for two specific examples of functions in purrr package that could be motivating for the students.

item.title: Interactive web applications with Shiny - meetup material
item.description: Hello! In February I will participate in a meetup of the R-Ladies chapter R-Ladies Resistencia-Corrientes and the R user group R en el NEA. These groups represent the R users of Resistencia and Corrientes cities of Argentina. The meetup consists of a workshop where attendees will learn to build their own apps. This material improves the one that I presented in an R-Ladies Buenos Aires meetup in 2017. Material Slides
